description:
Graffi0

Who needs pen and paper? Just jot it with your finger!

"Graffi0" is an electronic note maker that lets you post your pennings just like the familiar yellow sticky notes of yesteryear. No keyboard here, though.  Just fingerprinting goodness. So, go ahead, crib up a storm with Graffi0.

This Exhibition-Mode-only App enables you to scribble a quick note to self, while your TouchPad is slurping up some juice on your Touchstone charger. You can also date stamp and time code each of your unique notices.

On the other hand … maybe you like to sketch while you wait for your TouchPad to get a full charge.  Graffi0 has got you covered there, too.  Just let your fave digit doodle you some art 'til your battery is topped off. Or, show off your penning prowess with a daily 'scribble scrabble scramble' for entertaining friends & family members.

Just one word of warning, however: Graffi0 can be addictive … in a fun way.

"Graffi0" features:

~ Exhibition mode support; in fact, this App runs in Exhibition mode
~ Date stamp & time code your Graffi0
~ Variable-speed pen; faster = longer strokes, slower = tighter strokes
~ Different strokes for different folks
~ Simple, intuitive, and FUN
~ Made exclusively for the HP TouchPad
